doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 13 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 130 [Air Date: 12/26/1984]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 13 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 130 [Air Date: 12/26/1984]

Pride and ProgressNews - highlights:1. A recap of some of the major LGBT events of 1984. Clips include:2. Original "Stonewallers" at Pride Parade3. Bella Abzug speech at Greater Gotham Business MeetingCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp4. Virginia Apuzzo on LGBT presence at Democratic National Convention5. VP candidate Geraldine Ferraro at Democratic National Convention on human rights6. Maureen Reagan, daughter of President, interviewed at Republican National ConventionCOMMERCIAL: Carnaval in Rio de Janeiro, Islanders' Club7. Mayor Ed Koch at fundraiser for Judge Bill Thom8. David Rothenberg campaign speech10. Speech by Victor Gotbaum, Director DC 37, AFSCMECOMMERCIAL: World of Video11. [Fairpack], a new political gay action committee12. Reports on AIDS in 1984COMMERCIAL: Chamberlain and Associates, career service professionals13. Report on gays on television in 1984, including Showtime's cable series "Brothers"14. Gay youth16. Acquisition of NYC's LGBT Community Center on West 13th Street15. Wrap up of 1984 eventsCOMMERCIAL: Disc-o-rama, NY video and music store16. Healthline: Conversations with GMHC: Michael Shernoff, Chelsea Psychotherapy, discusses how to deal with friends who have AIDS17. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. Performance by the Big Apple Corps Band with the Pink PantherCOMMERCIAL: "The Gascon," a novel by John Colin Penford2. Gary Dee, female impersonator, on playing Joan RiversCOMMERCIAL: Disc-o-rama, NY video and music store3. "Home for the Holidays," benefit at Limelight for AIDS Research Center (ARC), appearances by Whoopi Goldberg, Maurice HinesCOMMERCIAL: "The Connection," gay and lesbian newspaper4. "Impulse," Gat TV in AtlantaCOMMERCIAL: World of Video5. Closing Credits
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 13 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 130 [Air Date: 12/26/1984]: December 1984
